job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWere a cognitive science company on a mission to optimize the measurement of brain health to advance the development of new medicines and to enable earlier clinical insights in healthcare ppnbspppThats why were seeking anbspSoftware Engineer responsible for developing platform components and product functionality for a portfolio of products which make up Cogstates solution offeringsnbspThe Software Engineer will be given substantial feature ownership and is expected to contribute product ideas as well as codenbspThis position will work closely with RampD Product Management Test and Quality Assurance teamsppbrppAs of 4121 this posting is not open to candidates based in COppnbspppbrppstrongKey ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliUnderstand and evaluate user stories workflows and wireframesliliCollaborate with product managers expand upon desired functionality and provide technical approaches that accomplish the product needsliliIdentify functionality contained within our platform library as well as contribute to its capabilitiesliliDevelop feature functionality within the platform framework for product specific requirements while still maintaining reuse and leveraging design patternsliliDevelop clean code reusable components and unit testsliulpbrppstrongQualifications amp Experience strongpulliBachelors Degree or equivalent experienceliliKnowledge of JavaScript TypeScript Angular HTML5 and CSS3liliKnowledge of C Entity Framework REST Services with WebAPIliliKnowledge of Relational and NoSQL databases such as SQL Server and MongoDBliliExperience with version control systems TFS GitliliStrong experience with web standards browser capabilities workarounds bestpractice development techniquesliliJavaScript unit testing namespacing and design patternsliliWrite clean testable xbrowser modular commented codeliliExperience with agile development methodologiesliulpbrppstrongSkills amp ExpertisestrongpulliAbility to quickly understand and evaluate user stories workflows and wireframesliliGood communication skills  work collaboratively and development counterparts and others within the teamnbspliliExceptional problemsolving skills  creative outofthebox thinking and comfort evaluating and deploying new technologiesliliSolid ability to work effectively under pressure and meet tight deadlinesliliAbility to adapt and learn new technologiesliulpbrppstrongCompany PerksstrongpulliRemote Work Practices Cogstate is a virtual first company Cogstate employees can work from anywhere where Cogstate is registered to do business within the United States Australia or the United KingdomliliGenerous Paid Timeoff Cogstate employees receive 20 days of vacation leave 10 days of personal leave and 10 paid public holidays which can be tailored to dates of personal cultural or religious significance to youlili401k Matching As you invest in yourself and your future Cogstate invests in you too we match up to 3 of your yearly salary in Cogstates 401k programliliCompetitive Salary We offer competitive base salaries plus additional earning opportunities based on the positionliliHealth Dental amp Vision Coverage Weve invested in comprehensive health amp dental insurance options with competitive company contributions to help when you need it most We also offer free vision insurance for all fulltime employeesliliShortTerm amp LongTerm Disability Life Insurance 100 employer sponsoredliliPreTax Benefits Healthcare and Dependent Care Flexible Spending AccountsliliLearning amp Development OpportunitiesnbspCogstate offers a robust learning program from mentorships to scholarships to Coursera to improve knowledge or obtain certifications in applicable areas of interestliulpbrppstrongWhy We Do What We DostrongppOur mission at Cogstate is to optimize the measurement of brain health to advance the development of new medicines and to enable earlier clinical insights in healthcare We are driven by the notion that through our work we impact the health of communities by delivering solutions that combine breakthrough science with advanced technologies We are inspired by the dedication of researchers and the resilience of patients and we are strengthened by our 20year heritage supporting them We are always working to simplify the complex with solutions that offer insights and hope for the future of healthcare particularly dementiarelated diseases and rare and pediatric disordersppstrongnbspstrongppstrongOur Core ValuesstrongpullistrongnbspstrongDo the Right thing  We are honest and dependable We keep our promises act with integrity and foster trust through fairness transparency and open communicationliliThink like a customer  We see our customers challenges as our own and strive to help them succeed We listen learn what makes them tick and adapt to creatively meet their needsliliTake care of each other  We work together to tackle big challenges that can only be achieved through the collective and caring efforts of diverse individuals We show appreciation value differences and celebrate winsliliLead with science  We are determined curious thinkers who use knowledge and data to challenge the status quo and redefine what is possible We are experts in our fields who are trusted by our customersliliOwn it  We are accountable to excellence and hold ourselves to high standards We are problem solvers at heart and quick to both identify obstacles and bring solutionsliliWork Hard  We show resilience in the face of hardship to do the messy work of innovating We stick to difficult tasks with grit and determination We iterate experiment and embrace failing forwardliliSee the big picture  We are driven by an understanding that the work we do matters Our personal connections to the mission may be different but we know our why and it motivates us to do our best workliulpstrongnbspstrongppstrongCommitment to Diversity amp Inclusion strongppCogstate is committed to building and maintaining a fair diverse and inclusive workplace where the personal worth of each employee is recognized and all are respected and valued for their differences Applicants with disabilities may be entitled to reasonable accommodation under the terms of the Americans with Disabilities Act and certain state or local laws If you need assistance in applying please email PeopleandCulturecogstatecomp
